title: AMERICA WE KNOW ALREADY
body:
Yes it's Independence day we know, but for goodness sakes you weren't the only ones that helped stop the Aliens, and the rest of us aren't making a big deal about it

https://m.youtube.com/watch?v=Eujwxh_r43E

replies.body: we were the ones that figured out that our shitty computer viruses could destroy the mother ship so get rekt
There will be no letting up! USA USA USA

But we're the only ones who did it on a national holiday! Anywhere else, people would be like "Oh, but it's my day off! Let's do that tomorrow."

Because Americans are _totally_ not lazy and entitled...

fuck you we are a super power anyway

go join the club of "fuck america cus we need our ego to be boosted"

But... I'm American...

I thought I was allowed to make fun of groups I'm associated with!
Well, I'm definitely lazy (I spend WAY too much time on the Boards these days...).

i ate 5 bags of air popped cheddar popcorn  in 3 days, 2 of them were family sized

beat that
Wait, there's a lazy off going on here? Don't make me pull out the laziness trophy I have, that Is still in the box. I sleep in the chair that I game in.
I game in the bed I sleep in.
I order delivery and have them take it to the window of my bedroom, which I can reach from my chair.
I'm so lazy, I hired someone to hire other people to hire even more people to play games for me

I'm so lazy that I got overweight just so that I could work from home, and now that I do I use a drinking bird to hit the accept button instead of actually working.

(I'm so lazy I don't even come up with my own reasons why I'm lazy.)
Dang it, second story window. You win...
I am making someone else type this for me
I concede defeat... You are, by far, much lazier than I am.

That is because the rest of the world was cowering behind us like little children. It was the President of the United States of America who rallied the world, it was an American scientist that lowered their shields, and it was an American pilot who dealt the killing blow.

http://rs259.pbsrc.com/albums/hh304/margaret63020/BUILDING%207/PENTAGON/FLIGHT%2093/TOWERS/COUNTRY/ani_aflag.gif~c200

> [{quoted}](name=Laughing Fish,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=Q0LX70Bj,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-07-04T15:50:40.668+0000)
>
> That is because the rest of the world was cowering behind us like little children. It was the President of the United States of America who rallied the world, it was an American scientist that lowered their shields, and it was an American pilot who dealt the killing blow.
> 
> http://rs259.pbsrc.com/albums/hh304/margaret63020/BUILDING%207/PENTAGON/FLIGHT%2093/TOWERS/COUNTRY/ani_aflag.gif~c200

Hell yes.

'Murica.

Seriously though, your patriotism is beautiful. If only all of these filthy millennials were like this (yes, I'm a millennial myself).
Spoiler:  They're coming back with bigger ships

https://giphy.com/gifs/how-dare-you-angery-could-kUPM1VpqejdgA

SPOILERS ARE AWFUL!!!

YOU MONSTER!!!
